attributes.action: Review the 6 month healthcare rule for any ex pat who has to return to UK for medical reasons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently an ex-pat returning to UK permanantly for health reasons,has to wait 6 months to qualify for NHS healthcare. It is unacceptable to leave British Citizens without NHS medical cover for 6 months during what maybe the most vulnerable time of their life. Their human rights are being abused and this makes a mockery of the European Union.
